## LifeCycleObserverRegistry.invokeObserver() method

Invoke an observer for the given event

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected invokeObserver(observer: LifeCycleObserver, event: keyof LifeCycleObserver): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  observer | <code>LifeCycleObserver</code> | A life cycle observer |
|  event | <code>keyof LifeCycleObserver</code> | Event name |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
